history.proof: intros d s s' sigma H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. hauto lq: on use: states_kill_aux_ref_ok_invar unfold: states_kill, state_ref_ok.

original: intros d s s' sigma H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. apply preDTA_kill. simpl in H3. destruct (states_kill_aux (dta_non_empty_states d) s) eqn:E. - discriminate H3. - inversion H3; subst. clear H3. apply states_kill_aux_ref_ok_invar with (sigma := sigma) in H5. + apply H5. + apply H2. + apply H4. + apply H1.
